parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.46

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Markers

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns marker color for given marker. See also [[setMarkerColor]].

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[markerColor]] markerName

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> markerName: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[String]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[if]] ([[markerColor]] "Marker1" == "ColorRed") [[then]] { [[hint]] "Marker1 is red!" };</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setMarkerColor]], [[setMarkerColorLocal]]
</value></part></template>
